Man and beast transform into a single two-headed gigantic animal by the [[Human Beast Combination Transformation: Double-Headed Wolf]] technique, and just like its [[Fang Wolf Fang|parent technique]], have their body spin in a violent assault against the enemy. The power is great enough to break through [[Summoning: Triple Rashōmon|three Rashōmon gates]] without losing its power. In addition unlike its parent technique it does not first require the use of [[Dynamic Marking]] first.

[[Clan::Inuzuka clan| ]]
